name: Ducky's Day Out - Post Jam
description:
Description

Mama Duck  has left little Ducky  behind! It is up to you to place animals around the stage to assist Ducky’s journey back to Mama. Ducky is always moving, so use frogs  and eagles  to avoid snakes , tigers , and more! Plan out your level on the fly to keep Ducky alive!

Use your mouse to place animals from the bottom hotbar into the level. Right click will cancel a placement, but they cannot be deleted so choose wisely! If you get stuck in any way, you can kill Ducky (boo) or reset the level.

Want an extra challenge? Go for the Bread  collectible in each level!!

Controls

W, A, S, D or Right Click and Drag to move the camera.

Left Click and drag critter portraits to place them on the map. You can move critters you already placed by clicking on them again (but only while Ducky is not yet hatched). Right click while holding a critter to put him back on the bar.

Utilities

The following tools/software were used to make Ducky’s Day Out:

  • Godot
  • LMMS
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Affinity Photo
  • Audacit

This is a post jam version of Ducky's Day Out (4/21/2020 @6pm EST)

The improvements have all been quality of life and include: Respawning sugar gliders, move-able critters, and not auto-spawning Ducky.  Thanks for playing!
